title: A Threat-Intelligence Driven Methodology to Incorporate Uncertainty in Cyber Risk Analysis and Enhance Decision Making
summary: The challenge of decision-making under uncertainty in information security has become increasingly important, given the unpredictable probabilities and effects of events in the ever-changing cyber threat landscape. Cyber threat intelligence provides decision-makers with the necessary information and context to understand and anticipate potential threats, reducing uncertainty and improving the accuracy of risk analysis.
